task.title: Starting a chat
task.shortdesc: You can start a chat with anyone within your chat community.

taskbody.context:
There are several ways you can initiate a chat:
From your contact list
Locate a person
From your list of previous chats

step.cmd: Locate the person that you want to chat with.
Type your message in the chat message field.
step.info: You can do one or more of the following within the chat message field.

choices.choice: You can attach a file to your message by using the attach icon ().
You can also send a meeting link to switch from a chat to a meeting. Click the meeting icon () and an instant meeting is started and the link sent to your chat partners.
Locate and add an emoji to your message by clicking the emoji icon ().

step.cmd: Press Enter or the send icon () to send your message to your chat partner.
